subject: [Announce] JUnit-addons : re-released for Windows users
msgSnippet: Unfortunately Ant 1.5.2 had a bug in the zip target and generated apparently empty zip archives for Windows users.  (maybe in an attempt to make them switch
messageBody:
Unfortunately Ant 1.5.2 had a bug in the zip target and generated
"apparently" empty zip archives for Windows users. (maybe in an
attempt to make them switch to Linux :-) ).

The problem has been fixes in Ant 1.5.3 and I have recreated the
releases for JUnit-addons 1.4 and JUnit-addons Runner 1.0-alpha2.
They can be downloaded at <http://junit-addons.sf.net>

Sorry for the inconvenience

-Vladimir
